title: Evelyn de Rothschild, Scion of Banking Dynasty, Dies at 91

media:description: Evelyn de Rothschild in 1968. He mastered the intricacies of a boutique bank trying to survive in a globalized world of financial institutions. He was a financial adviser to Queen Elizabeth II.
